message.entry: Could not create the SPI object. Please ensure that the vendor driver is correctly installed.
Property cannot be set while the OBJ is CONNECTED.
OBJ must be connected to the hardware with CONNECT.
Cannot create a communication link with the device.\nVendor Driver Error : {0}
CONNECT failed. OBJ is already connected.
Cannot destroy the communication link with the device.\nVendor Driver Error : {0}
Unable to load the {0} library. Please ensure the library is in the MATLAB path.
Vendor Driver Error : {1} (error code {0}) while executing {2}
Error communicating with the hardware.\nVendor Driver Error : {0}
Data outside the range of precision uint8. The values of a uint8 range from 0 to 255. Values outside this range mapped to 0 or 255.
OBJ must be a 1-by-1 interface object.
Incorrect number of input arguments. The SPI object should have the following signature: \nS = spi('Vendor', BoardIndex, Port)
Access to your hardware may be provided by a support package. Go to the Support Package Installer to learn more.
